toxi.math

Class Interpolation2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • toxi.math.Interpolation2D

  • public class Interpolation2D
extends Object
    Implementations of 2D interpolation functions (currently only bilinear).

      • bilinear

        public static float bilinear(double x,
             double y,
             double x1,
             double y1,
             double x2,
             double y2,
             float tl,
             float tr,
             float bl,
             float br)
        Parameters:
        x - x coord of point to filter
        y - y coord of point to filter
        x1 - x coord of top-left corner
        y1 - y coord of top-left corner
        x2 - x coord of bottom-right corner
        y2 - y coord of bottom-right corner
        tl - top-left value
        tr - top-right value
        bl - bottom-left value
        br - bottom-right value
        Returns:
        interpolated value

        Parameters:

        p1 - top-left corner
        p2 - bottom-right corner
        tl - top-left value
        tr - top-right value
        bl - bottom-left value
        br - bottom-right value
        Returns:
        interpolated value
